about.hero_description: Naradev is a modern editorial platform built for sharing engineering knowledge. Write in Markdown, manage effortlessly, and publish beautifully.
about.features_description: Everything you need to write, publish, and share technical content.
about.feature_1_desc: Write articles in Markdown with real-time preview and syntax highlighting.
about.feature_2_desc: Organize and discover content with a flexible tagging system.
about.feature_3_desc: JWT-based authentication with role-based access control.
about.feature_4_desc: Beautiful reading experience on any device, from mobile to desktop.
about.feature_5_desc: Comfortable reading in any lighting condition with automatic dark mode.
about.feature_6_desc: Server-side rendered with optimized meta tags for search engines.
about.tech_description: Powered by cutting-edge technologies for performance and developer experience.
about.cta_description: Join the community of developers sharing their knowledge on Naradev.

validation.USERNAME_MIN_LENGTH: Username must be at least 3 characters
validation.USERNAME_INVALID_FORMAT: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
